title: _WDF_POWER_POLICY_S0_IDLE_CAPABILITIES (wudfddi_types.h)
description: Learn how the WDF_POWER_POLICY_S0_IDLE_CAPABILITIES enumeration identifies the capabilities that a device can support when it enters a low-power state while it is idling.
